title: Virginia Walmart Employees Slain in Shooting Are Mourned; Killings marked second high-profile mass shooting in the U.S. in days
text:
Several other people were injured in the shooting. A spokesman for Sentara Norfolk General Hospital said Thursday that two victims remained in critical condition. A third victim was released from the hospital Wednesday.

The shootings occurred late Tuesday night during a busy Thanksgiving week in the city of Chesapeake, about 5 miles south of downtown Norfolk, Va. Police said Andre Bing, 31, opened fire with a handgun less than an hour before the store was set to close. At least 50 people were in the store at the time, police said.

Updates to follow as news develops.

Virginia Walmart Employees Slain in Shooting Are Mourned
